detectors.description:
Tater.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#14-75) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 10000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#16)
detectors.markdown:

	- [initialSupply = 10000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#L16)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#4)
	- Tater.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#22-24)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#5)
	- Tater.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#28-30)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#6)
	- Tater.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#32-34)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Tater.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#59-63)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#8)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#9)
	- Tater.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Tater.sol#36-45)
